channel.title: HELP! Range Crashing..! paying cash for help~!
channel.description:
Error with player 1, Mark java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 300 at client.CreateProjectile(client.java:7404) at client.rangeGFXNPC(client.java:2258) at client.process(client.java:17074) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:2 at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Mark ClientHandler: Client Mark disconnected (localhost)
Everyime i use range this thing happens =( i figured out it has nothing to do with the client.java, i tried putting a new client.java and rewriting it without any of the range code

item.title: HELP! Range Crashing..! paying cash for help~!
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

did u use GFX? looks like the GFX is having an error and loggin you out, try to set a GFx to the range emotes when u shoot an arrow

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! Range Crashing..! paying cash for help~!
